com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table

Interface RowModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRowModel, DefaultRowModel

    public interface RowModel
    The RowModel interface specifies the methods the TabularPropertyInspector will use to interrogate a tabular data model.
    See Also:
    TabularPropertyInspector

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRowModelListener(RowModelListener l)
      Add a listener to the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs.
      Object getBean(int index)
      Returns a bean at the index.
      Class getBeanClass()
      Return class of beans in this row model.
      void removeRowModelListener(RowModelListener l)
      Remove a listener from the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs.
      int size()
      Returns a number of beans in the model.

    • Method Detail

      • addRowModelListener

        void addRowModelListener(RowModelListener l)
        Add a listener to the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs.
        Parameters:
        l - the RowModelListener

      • removeRowModelListener

        void removeRowModelListener(RowModelListener l)
        Remove a listener from the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs.
        Parameters:
        l - the RowModelListener

      • size

        int size()
        Returns a number of beans in the model. A TabularPropertyInspector uses this method to determine how many rows it should display. This method should be quick, as it is called frequently during rendering.

      • getBean

        Object getBean(int index)
        Returns a bean at the index.

      • getBeanClass

        Class getBeanClass()
        Return class of beans in this row model. This method is needed for empty row model and for row model that contains beans of different classes.
        Returns:
        Class of beans in this row model.
